content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord conducting negotiations, I aim to secure the highest possible rent for my apartment in Magdeburg. To begin discussions, I propose a rental price of 1100 Euros per month. Please consider this figure and share your offer with me. If we reach an agreement, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and the negotiation will end. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
